govtReadMore.title: Government Scheme
govtReadMore.description: PM-Kisan provides income support to all landholding farmers' families to supplement their financial needs for procuring various inputs related to agriculture and allied activities as well as domestic needs.

price.description: Wheat is one of the most widely grown crops in India. Prices may vary depending on quality and location. This is the current market price for standard grade wheat.

cropReadMore.title: Crop Details
cropReadMore.name: Wheat
cropReadMore.description: Wheat is one of the most widely grown crops in India. It’s a staple food grain and plays a major role in the agricultural economy. Prices may vary depending on quality and region.
cropReadMore.soil: Soil Type: Well-drained loamy or clay-loam soil

privacyPolicy.desc1: Welcome to the Agriculture Assistant System. We value and respect your privacy, and we are committed to safeguarding your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines the methods we employ to collect, process, and secure your data in accordance with applicable laws and best practices.
privacyPolicy.desc2: We may collect personal information including, but not limited to, your name, contact number, geographical location, and farming preferences. This data is essential for providing you with tailored recommendations and enhanced agricultural services.
privacyPolicy.desc3: Your information is utilized exclusively for delivering AI-driven agricultural assistance, updates regarding government schemes, real-time market price alerts, and access to farming community discussions.
privacyPolicy.desc4: We implement advanced encryption techniques and utilize Firebase Authentication to safeguard your account credentials and personal data from unauthorized access or misuse.
privacyPolicy.desc5: Should you have any queries or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us through the in-app support section or via our official contact channels.
privacyPolicy.copyright: © 2025 Agriculture Assistant System. All rights reserved.
